entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
